strapiPost.title: Stages.Live App Connecting Northwest Arkansas Through Community Events And Live Music
strapiPost.content:
Stages.Live is the go-to app for finding community events in Northwest Arkansas. Featuring live music, comedy shows, game nights, and more through its smart calendar, Stages.Live is growing a vibrant live music scene in our community. 

  • Street Cred: The app was created locally in Rogers and has already grown a huge following, even being named the official app of the upcoming Eureka Springs Blues Party on Jun 1-4. Local business leaders can help keep the app free to the public through sponsorships. 
  • Stream Local Music: Beyond connecting venues and musicians, one exciting feature of the app is its built-in streaming music video player, where you can discover local talent with curated video playlists and even tip our local artists. 

Download Stages.Live from the App Store and Google Play and discover live music and other events happening near you.
